name: Creating Amusement Park - ContentsDa Science Experiment
summary:
find the science behind an amusement park.
Use a hydraulic robotic arm to load trash into a truck.
Build a fountain using the Heron Fountain pieces.
Build a bridge using arch bridge pieces.
Build a roller coaster to make the roller coaster ball go around.
Build a trapeze using the trapeze parts.
Build a gyro drop with the gyro drop parts.
Plug in the engines of three cars and turn the engines at different speeds to see how fast they go.
Build a Ferris wheel with the Ferris wheel...
